channel.title: If you have two routers, do I have to portforward both or something?
channel.description: I got two routers, I only portforwarded one, which my Pc uses. Do I need to do both or something?

item.title: If you have two routers, do I have to portforward both or something?
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ryan Andrew Ryan
item.description:
@Andrew_Ryan wrote:

Oh wow, I’m sorry, Well my Server won’t connect, there because of my router, Now it is Server help. Happy?

If you got a better lace for me to post this please redirect me. Not really…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 26, 2009, 06:37:23 pm[/size][hr][quote=“Darkning, post:3, topic:269612”]No portforwarding/computer related issues. This is for server help only. For information on portforwarding use portforward.com[/quote]

Dude, I’m just asking if you need to do both? Is it really that hard to answer a question, Do you really need to take me to portforward?

Read full topic
